title: DVD-Cloner.Platinum.v6.40.982-TE
description:
DVD-Cloner Platinum is powerful DVD copying/converting/burning software. It has all the features of DVD-Cloner plus the ability to convert all your DVD movies to iPod Nano, Classic and Touch. It's a user-friendly program with excellent output quality. The latest version utilizes SmartAnalyser to ensure the highest level of success copying latest DVD movies. Give it a try and you'll find your ideal multimedia solution!

iPod-Cloner is a one-click solution to convert all kinds of DVD to iPod compatible format. Its built-in iPod Files Manager allows you to transport all files, including music, video, movies and TV shows directly from PC to iPod.

Key features:

* Perfect 1:1 DVD Copy
* Backs up Blu-ray and HD DVD movies
* Directly transports DVD files from PC to iPod without iTunes!

Features of DVD-Cloner:

* Enhanced burning engine, fast and stable burn

Features of iPod-Cloner:

* Directly transports DVD files from PC to iPod without iTunes!
Converts DVD to iPod MP4 (MPEG-4), Xvid, H264 formats
* Supports the conversion of latest DVD movies

* Adds or removes borders
